Generation III.Ruby: Shroomish live in damp soil in the dark depths of forests. They are often found keeping still under fallen leaves. This Pok é mon feeds on compost that is made up of fallen, rotted leaves.
Generation III.Sapphire: If Shroomish senses danger, it shakes its body and scatters spores from the top of its head. This Pok é mon 's spores are so toxic, they make trees and weeds wilt.
Generation III.Emerald: It loves to eat damp, composted soil in forests. If you enter a forest after a long rain, you can see many Shroomish feasting on composted soil.
Generation III.FireRed: It prefers damp places. By day it remains still in the forest shade. It releases toxic powder from its head.
Generation III.LeafGreen: It prefers damp places. By day it remains still in the forest shade. It releases toxic powder from its head.

Generation IV.Diamond: It spouts poison spores from the top of its head. These spores cause pain all over if inhaled.

Generation IV.HeartGold: If it senses danger, it scatters spores from the top of its head to protect itself.
